Bangarraju (UA)

Movie

  • Release Date: 14 Jan 2022
  • OTT Release Date: 18 Feb 2022
  • Genre(s): Drama, Comedy, Fantasy, Family
  • Language(s): తెలుగు
  • Director(s): Satyam Bellamkonda, Kalyan Krishna
  • Cast(s): Nagarjuna Akkineni, Naga Chaitanya Akkineni, Ramya Krishnan, Krithi Shetty, Vennela Kishore See all Cast & Crew
  • Duration: 2h 31min
  • Music: Sid Sriram,Anup Rubens,Mohana Bhogaraju
  • Similar To: Mayabazar, Vitamin She

    Sequel to Soggade Chinninayana, starring Nagarjuna, Naga Chaitanya, Ramya Krishna, and Krithi Shetty in lead roles. Directed by Kalyan Krishna.
